critique: The document expresses concern and determination to address the issue of missing and murdered American Indians and Alaska Natives. It aims to convey a sense of responsibility and action. Joy is not present. Sadness is present due to the subject matter. Anger is not a primary emotion but may be a secondary emotion related to the injustice. Fear is not directly conveyed. Disgust might be present due to the nature of the crimes. Surprise is not a primary emotion.
